values: 追求；追踪；追捕；追逐；从事；继续；执行；实行；致力于；沿着（小道、路线）前进；延伸；获得；努力获得；寻求；探索；研究

sample.mean: v. 购买；升起；举起；获得；得到
n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 追求者；追捕者；研究者；原告

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指坚持不懈、毫不动摇地紧跟、追赶某人、某物或某个事业。
指根据线索或足迹进行跟踪。用于抽象意义时指找到某事物的根源。
指沿着人或动物留下的印迹或行迹追踪。
原义为“追猎、猎取”，现用于指追捕或搜寻逃犯等。
指快速追赶或决心追踪，褒义贬义均可用。
普遍用词，含义最广，多指跟随起引导作用的人或物，跟随的动机可以是善意的，也可能是恶意的。

word_group.brief_definition: 积极追求；积极争取；积极学习

bilingual.source: Do you think many parents tend to pressure their children to get stable jobs instead of letting them pursue their own interests?
bilingual.target: 你认为许多父母倾向于给孩子施加压力，让他们找稳定的工作，而不是让他们追求自己的兴趣吗？
她敢于追求自己的梦想。
我们应该追求高尚的品质。

bilingual.source: He decided to pursue a career in medicine.
The brave dare to pursue their dreams.
bilingual.target: 勇者敢于追求自己的梦想。
我们应该追求幸福和成功。

bilingual.source: He decided to pursue a career as a doctor.
bilingual.target: 他决定追求医生的生涯。

bilingual.source: Young people like to pursue fashion things.
bilingual.target: 年轻人喜欢追求新潮的东西。

bilingual.source: He decided to leave to pursue his dreams.
bilingual.target: 他决定起身去追求自己的梦想。

bilingual.source: He quit his job to pursue a career in art.
bilingual.target: 他放弃了工作去追求艺术事业。

list.abstract: pursue，英文单词，动词，翻译为继续、从事、追赶、纠缠、继续进行等。

yingyinNormal.en: And therefore, you won't be able to give me the time of day because you have bigger things to pursue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你不可能有空陪我，因为你有更宏远的追求。

yingyinNormal.en: Such a testosterone boost may give a man the nudge to pursue a woman he might not have otherwise noticed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样的睪固酮激增就可能驱使男人去追求一位他原来也许不会注意到的女人。

yingyinNormal.en: I suppose, in his own way, my dad also encouraged me to pursue science. I mean, he is the one that taught me that flatulence is combustible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我爸爸也是用了他自己的方法鼓励我追求科学。比如就是他教了我原来屁是可燃的。

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever ventures I might pursue would be to make clear that what unites us is ultimately far more redeeming and compelling than anything that separates me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论我追求的是什么，我都会明确，将我们团结在一起的信念终将远远胜过拆散我们的一切事物。

yingyinNormal.en: Since I didn't start out with money, and I didn't need much more than a bed to sleep in and food to eat, I could skew my decisions to pursue my adventures. So ever since I was a kid, I ran after the things I wanted, crashed, got up and ran again, and crashed again, and each time I crashed, I learned something, got better, and crashed less.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我起步时钱不多，但需要的也不多，一张床容身，填饱肚子就行。为了追求冒险我会改变决定。自从我还是小孩起，我就追寻想要的东西，跌倒爬起来再追再跌倒，每次跌倒我都有所受益，有所改善跌倒得越来越少。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny is not the reason I didn't pursue that idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不实践那个点子不是。因为佩妮。

yingyinNormal.en: Pursue us, you'll be caught. Resist us, you'll be killed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 继续追查我们，你会被抓住，跟我们做对，你就会被干掉。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good. Priya has moved back to India to pursue her law career.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又来了，普丽娅回印度去发展自己的法律事业。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll pursue other strategies and get back to you, Mr. President.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们会考虑其他策略，再给您答复，总统先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, here we go. Encouraging more women to pursue a career in the sciences.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主题就是鼓励更多女性加入科学领域。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have aspirations for a career, or a professional dream that you wish to pursue?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有没有想要从事的事业想要实现的职业梦想？

yingyinNormal.en: Raymond told me this was your idea, to pursue this compromise. I suggested it as an option.
yingyinNormal.zh: Raymond告诉我这是你的点子？做出妥协？我只是提出建议。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, Tusk should not be determining policy. The president alone should instruct you on what you are to pursue.
yingyinNormal.zh: Tusk怎么能参与政策？只有总统可以决定你该怎么做。

yingyinNormal.en: We're deploying our doctors and scientists supported by our military to help corral the outbreak and pursue new treatments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正在派遣我们的医生和科学家，在我们军队的帮助下，控制疫情并寻求新的治疗方法。

yingyinNormal.en: The truth is I have nothing of interest to pursue. Well, maybe this is the perfect opportunity to take some time for yourself and refocus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实我最近没有任何感兴趣的项目。或许现在是个很棒的机会来沉淀自己重新找到方向。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me. I'm uncomfortable with you recommending that Leonard pursue having intercourse with Dr. Plimpton, who I assure you has better things to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打扰一下，我对你提议莱纳德争取与普林顿博士性交感到不安，她可还有更重要的事要忙。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 追赶；追捕；追击；沿着…前进；（pursue的现在分词）
n. 追赶；追逐；追捕；追击；追求；寻求；特定活动；自行车追逐赛；追视

word_family.mean: v. 追赶；追逐；追捕；追击；沿着（小道；路线）前进；延伸；获得；竭力引诱

sense_info_list.en: seek to attain or accomplish a goal over a long period

examination_example.sentence: As adults, it seems that we are constantly <highlight>pursuing</highlight> happiness, often with mixed results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为成年人，我们似乎在不断追求幸福，结果往往喜忧参半。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pursuing</highlight> a bachelor's degree in another major.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 攻读另一个专业的学士学位。

sense_info_list.en: engage in an activity or course of action
follow someone or something in order to catch or attack them
(of a person or way) continue or proceed along a path or route

sample.mean: v. 购买；升起；举起；获得；得到
n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

word_usage.usage: pursue表“寻求; 追求”时，为及物动词，后可直接加名词，如：pursue happiness 追求幸福。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 追赶；追逐；追捕；追击；追求；寻求；特定活动；自行车追逐赛；追视

word_family.mean: v. 追赶；追逐；追捕；追击；沿着（小道；路线）前进；延伸；获得；竭力引诱

sense_info_list.en: follow someone or something in order to catch or attack them; (of a person or way) continue or proceed along a path or route

examination_example.sentence: She can devote all her life to <highlight>pursuing</highlight> her passion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她可以用一生去追求自己的激情。

examination_example.sentence: In other words, structural unemployment is a fake problem, which mainly serves as an excuse for not <highlight>pursuing</highlight> real solutions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说，结构性失业是一个假问题，主要是作为不寻求真正解决方案的借口。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pursuing</highlight> a career is an essential part of adolescent development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 追求事业是青少年发展的重要组成部分。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, they know their strengths when <highlight>pursuing</highlight> a goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，他们在追求目标时知道自己的优势。

examination_example.sentence: It was seen as a tool to <highlight>pursue</highlight> knowledge, not pleasure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它被视为追求知识的工具，而不是快乐。

sense_info_list.en: seek to attain or accomplish a goal over a long period

examination_example.sentence: System institutions are operating very efficiently based on this analysis, raising the question of the value of <highlight>pursuing</highlight> a broad scale outsourcing initiative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这一分析，董事系统机构运作得非常有效率，这引发了推行大规模外包计划的价值问题。

sense_info_list.en: engage in an activity or course of action

sample.mean: v. 购买；升起；举起；获得；得到
n. 目的；意图；决心；考虑；意志；决断；要求

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 追赶；追逐；追捕；追击；沿着（小道；路线）前进；延伸；获得；竭力引诱

examination_example.sentence: You may <highlight>pursue</highlight> training, degrees, or increasing levels of responsibility at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以追求培训，学位，或者在工作中增加责任。

examination_example.sentence: Jenifer Mauer has needed more willpower than the typical college student to <highlight>pursue</highlight> her goal of earning a nursing degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了实现获得护理学位的目标，珍妮弗·莫尔比一般大学生需要更多的毅力。
我从来没有追求过他们。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 追踪; 追击; 追求

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 追踪; 追击; 追求

examination_example.sentence: But even if no one believes in your dream, he says, you have to <highlight>pursue</highlight> (追求) it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是即使没有人相信你的梦想，他说，你也必须去追求它。
